name: Football Pro
title: Football Pro
description: -SportMonks API- Looking for better and reliable Football Data? More Leagues(1.000+)? Faster Livescores (>15 faster)? And more available Odds and Stats? Check https://sportmonks.com/football-api  With this SportMonks Football Pro API we offer 900+ Leagues and the fastest real-time Livescores in the market with a rich set of other features like (live)Odds, Statistics, Line-ups, Standings and many more features. For example our Livescores are often faster than TV and often >15 seconds(!!) faster compared to other suppliers. With more than 14.000 registered users we we can say we are the go-to party for Fast en Reliable Football Data.  When you want your business idea to succeed, go for quality Football Data, and not the cheapest supplier. More info: https://sportmonks.com/football-api | | Docs: https://www.sportmonks.com/docs/football/2.0/

endpoints.name: Fixtures Between 2 Dates for one team
endpoints.description: With this endpoint you can get the fixtures between two dates for one team.

endpoints.name: All Countries
endpoints.description: The Countries endpoint provides you Country information like for example its Flag, IsoCode, Continent and other related Country information.

endpoints.name: Active Season by Team ID
endpoints.description: With this endpoint you can get an overview all the active seasons of one Team by ID
